thread.title: Sony to integrate YouView into Bravia TVs for 17000 films and shows
thread.title_full: Sony to integrate YouView into Bravia TVs for 17000 films and shows

title: Sony to integrate YouView into Bravia TVs for 17000 films and shows
text:
Sony to integrate YouView into Bravia TVs for 17,000 films and shows 
Pocket Lint Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Sony has announced a partnership with TV platform YouView that will put its services in Sony Bravia televisions. 
The YouView update will be a software rollout that happens over the air on all Bravia televisions that are compatible. This will begin rolling out from 8am on Wednesday 4 November. 
YouView on Sony Bravia Android connected televisions will mean access to services like BBC iPlayer, All 4, ITV Player and Demand 5. These services are seamlessly integrated with live TV thanks to YouView's scroll back user interface. That means a whopping 17,000 films and TV shows available through ...
